root.name: One Piece: Legend of the Rainbow Island
root.description: StoryThe story is based on the Baroque Works Saga. The straw hats finds a new companion who uses a boomerang as weapon. Along with the new companion they must fight Baroque Works and save Alabasta Playable Characters Monkey D. Luffy Roronoa Zoro Nami Usopp Sanji Tony Tony Chopper Vivi Nefertari New Companion
